name: Paper Slap Style
description:
Paper Slap Style is an endless challenge-based game inspired by the Fly Swatter Minigame from WarioWare: Mega Microgame$!. A challenge that gets tougher as you progress, it challenges you to stay on your toes and do your best.

Freesound.org credits:
